comments:
Build 20020416

Steps:

- install eclipse on a network drive
- check out a project
- modify a file in that project, don't save
- do Compare With -> Latest from Repo... on that file
- Go back to the editor for the file, try to save
- it reports out of sync on the file.  Click yes to save.

-> Now the file gets deleted from the filesystem (this is bug 13682).  However, 
now the java editor starts throwing NPEs.  Even though this condition is 
due to another bug, it would be a good idea to guard against the NPE.  Stack is 
attached:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.ProblemAnnotationIterator.<init>(ProblemA
nnotationIterator.java:22)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.text.java.hover.JavaProblemHover.getHoverInfo(JavaPr
oblemHover.java:62)
